sentences.sContent: I am the proprietor of the company.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am the proprietor of the company.
sentences.sCn: 我是这个公司的经营者。

sentences.sContent: Marketing concept is the reflection of the marketing activity in the consciousness of the proprietor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Marketing concept is the reflection of the marketing activity in the consciousness of the proprietor.
sentences.sCn: 市场营销观念是市场营销活动在经营者意识中的反映。

words.tran: 所有的；专利的；私人拥有的
